+* A Semi-Comprehensive List of Species of Interest

[[div class="pseudocrumbs"]]
----
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel standalone" style="font-family: Courier New, Courier, monospace; font-size: 1rem; width: auto; padding: 10px 30px; margin: 20px auto; background: URL:(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/about-the-scp-foundation/bg-marble.png) repeat; text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.25)"]]
The Foundation has identified a number of species around the world (and beyond it) that are actively anomalous and located in permanent communities. While these races would generally be given an SCP designation and contained, in some cases this is not possible, due to practical or political constraints. Although not all Species of Interest are fully controlled by the Foundation, containment measures are in place to ensure that the general public remains unaware of their existence or anomalous nature.

[[/div]]

The following locations either don't meet the requirements for inclusion on the parent [[[Species of Interest]]] page, meaning they're mentioned but not described in detail, or only appear in one article, or simply haven't gotten a writeup for the main list yet. Species from international branches may also be listed here if there isn't anything translated yet, but translations do count towards inclusion on the main list.

Feel free to add to this list - like the main list it's divided into Species, and then all other Species of Interest.

Do not just list everywhere that is mentioned in an SCP or Tale - while there's flexibility, the basic idea is still "anomalous species".

Is a species of pyramidal organisms native to an extradimensional space adjacent to Lenox, Massachusetts. ++ Extraterrestrial Nonhuman Species

**Antareans** 
Members of the "88th Antarean Expeditionary Regiment," an independent paramilitary group. 
* [[[SCP-6848]]] - The Dragon Under New Mexico 

**Children of the Satellite**
A race of cyborgs, who possess originally organic minds digitally transferred into metallic bodies. The construction and materials used for their bodies are reminiscent of those used by NASA in the 20th century, although some elements are reminiscent of Foundation long-distance probes. Worship the "screamer who is lost in space", whose "desire for revenge is a constant of emotional perfection".
* [[[SCP-3068]]] - Halycon Light Beta

**Draconians**
* [[[SCP-6848]]] - The Dragon Under New Mexico

**The Fallen**
* [[[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-cn-3002|SCP-CN-3002]]] - For all my compatriots past, present and future... (untranslated)

**Halogen**
Large, green and with prominent tentacles, the Halogen are known for their unusual language which lacks any syntax or consistent vocabulary. It is considered impossible to learn by non-Halogen, although they themselves often have a strong grasp of English.
* [[[SCP-3068]]] - Halycon Light Beta

**Kharai**
A mercantile race whose DNA matches that of the order Hymenoptera, the Kharai are humans with the heads, wings and colouring of the common wasp (Vespula vulgaris). The Kharai act as intergalactic merchants, with "a presence in every port"; they have been known to sell Naumachian hypercrystals, Lalandite spices and Korassian paradoxes to Foundation diplomats, among other wares. They purport to represent the "United Kharai Caravanserais."
* [[[SCP-3068]]] - Halycon Light Beta

**Lalandites**
Have a human appearance, with the exception of their grey skin and glowing white eyes. Initial encounters with Lalandites revealed them to be uniformly duplicitous and cruel; this abruptly changed on 09/11/2014, when they suddenly and uniformly gained a large number of rites, rituals and tragic backstories. The Lalandites purportedly originate on an unknown planet orbiting Lalande 21185, capital of the "Lalande Imperium". As of 09/11/2015, the Lalandites are in charge of SCP-3068.
* [[[SCP-3068]]] - Halycon Light Beta

**Pleiadians**
Another group associated with the Sirian alliance, known for their oral traditions regarding important artifacts.
* [[[SCP-6848]]] - The Dragon Under New Mexico

**Sirians**
Members of the "Alliance Organization of Sirius and the Pleiades," known for their amicable relations with other civilizations and combating Draconian influences.
* [[[SCP-6848]]] - The Dragon Under New Mexico

**Z-93291**
The self-designation of a race of hypothetical beings, whose existence is inferred by their actions. A database entry, quarters and diplomatic treatises purportedly written by them exist, but they have never been observed. Supposedly represent the Alliance of Conceptual Beings.
* [[[SCP-3068]]] - Halycon Light Beta

**Ionizing Ginkgo
**Scientific Name:** //Ginkgo oppenheimeri//
G. oppenheimeri is an arborescent plant species with the ability to absorb ionizing radiation from the substrate and emit it to the environment during its reproductive period, thanks to its specialized parenchyma tissue with the ability to absorb and emit such radiation. The endothecia of its seeds are highly resistant to fire and toxic chemical agents. The seeds can germinate under adverse conditions, even without the need for water or other nutrients, and at the time of the free nuclei phase, approximately 500 mSv are released into the environment within a radius of 20 meters, thus facilitating the development and growth of other seeds.

If the seeds are ingested by an animal, they will pseudo-germinate inside the organism and enter into a symbiotic relationship, where the plant will serve as protection with its branches and leaves: The epidermal cells will form cell walls, conferring the same capacity of resistance to damage and emission of ionizing radiation; however, their mobility is highly reduced, they lose their ability to vocalize and are usually in a period of prolonged inactivity.
* [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/hub-sueno-nuclear Nuclear Dream Hub]
* [[[http://lafundacionscp.wikidot.com/kte-2272-hogweed-van-allen-viridi |KTE-2272-Hogweed-Van Allen-Viridi]]] (untranslated)

**SCP-743-JP**
It is an insect of the Formicidae family similar to the Indian deer ant (Harpegnathos saltator), which lives in South Asia, mainly in the Republic of India. The morphological features of SCP-743-JP-EX are very similar to the species of the genus Harpegnathos, and the molecular information also shows a high degree of concordance with Harpegnathos saltator, except for the high allelic frequency of the lethal gene.

**SCP-1000-JP**
It is a worm-like aquatic vertebrate with a total length of 1.5‚Äì1.7 m. SCP-1000-JP shows similarities to mammals due to its anatomical features such as the shape of its skeleton and the presence of sweat glands, but also has the following combination of morphological traits that deviate from known mammals. The mentioned ruins, biological skeletons, and known DNA suggest that SCP-1000-JP-EX is a descendant of H. neanderthalensis , which was artificially modified in the Late Pleistocene . Naturally, Homo sapiens , who built a hunter-gatherer civilization using stone tools in the late Pleistocene , did not have comparable construction or genetic engineering technology available to modern times. The technology is believed to have been looted from Homo nocturnus during "The Day of Flowers".
* [[[http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/scp-1000-jp-ex| SCP-1000-JP-EX]]] - To those who inherited the stars (untranslated)

**SCP-5801-1 (Snow People)**
[[[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/niveaux-de-menace-des-objets-scp |Green]]] [[span style="color:green"]]‚óè[[/span]]
Sapient beings composed out of three spherical masses of snow, and possess tree branches in the place of limbs. Materials making up the facial features of SCP-5801-1 vary, but recorded materials include sticks, leaves, berries, vegetables, and rocks. SCP-5801-1 instances possess the ability to speak and move, and have been observed to converse with each other on a regular basis. SCP-5801 is an afterlife for deceased individuals whose effigies were shaped into SCP-5801-1 through a ritualistic process. Due to the absence of new SCP-5801-1 instances, it is assumed that this process no longer occurs.
* [[[SCP-5801]]] - Snowman Heaven
